name: Hasty Snow
detailed_description:
In developing

demo version - summer 2019 full release - winter 2019-2020


About the Game

Hasty Snow is fantasy tower defense VR game of snowballs with cool effects. Grab the snow to strike your enemies if they dare to come closer and destroy their fortress. You should grab much snow and evade the shots. This game is totally based on your high speed and wide movements. Currently in developing. Details soon.
